QuestsSorted.NameClass: DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFFFCE2E1-13 Dwarf + Gnome|r This is a DEMO Profile, and not the actual Paid Profile. If you like what you see here please go Buy my profile for 12$ at. ---------------------------- https://rocketr.net/sellers/Tarud")

MyFrame = CreateFrame("Frame") MyFrame:ClearAllPoints() MyFrame:SetBackdrop(StaticPopup1:GetBackdrop()) MyFrame:SetHeight(100) MyFrame:SetWidth(250)
MyFrame.text = MyFrame:CreateFontString(nil, "BACKGROUND", "GameFontNormal") MyFrame.text:SetAllPoints() MyFrame.text:SetText("Initializing profile...") MyFrame:SetPoint("CENTER", 0, -100) MyFrame:SetBackdropBorderColor(1, 0, 0, 1)
RateFrame = CreateFrame("Frame") RateFrame:ClearAllPoints() RateFrame:SetBackdrop(nil) RateFrame:SetHeight(60) RateFrame:SetWidth(140)

ByFrame = CreateFrame("Frame") ByFrame:ClearAllPoints() ByFrame:SetBackdrop(nil) ByFrame:SetHeight(60) ByFrame:SetWidth(140)
ByFrame.text = ByFrame:CreateFontString(nil, "BACKGROUND", "GameFontNormal") ByFrame.text:SetAllPoints() ByFrame.text:SetText("This is a DEMO Only") ByFrame:SetPoint("CENTER", -60, -45) ByFrame:SetBackdropBorderColor(1, 0, 0, 1)
CreateFrame("Frame","Test",UIParent) Test:SetWidth(100) Test:SetHeight(100) Test:SetPoint("CENTER",150,-85) Test:CreateTexture("TestTexture") TestTexture:SetAllPoints() TestTexture:SetTexture("Interface\\TargetingFrame\\UI-PVP-Alliance")
DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFFFCE2ERaceChecker|r Checking if we are GNOME or DWARF")
MyFrame.text:SetText("Are we a Gnome or Dwarf ?")

ObjectManager.Me.Level >= 1 && ObjectManager.Me.Level < 50 && (wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Dun Morogh" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "City of Ironforge" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Anvilmar" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Loch Modan")
MyFrame.text:SetText("Cast IMP and BUY Book forhim")
DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFFFCE2EProfessionGrabber|r Getting Skinning - Enable it when you can man!")
DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFFFCE2EArmsdealer|r Buying weapons, if we are rich enough.")
MyFrame.text:SetText("Hunter? No bows around. Manually Buy off AH!")

ObjectManager.Me.WowClass == WoWClass.Warlock && ObjectManager.Me.Level >= 10 && ObjectManager.Me.Level <= 14 && (wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Loch Modan" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "City of Ironforge")

ObjectManager.Me.Level >= 10 && ObjectManager.Me.Level < 23 && (wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "City of Ironforge" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Dun Morogh" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Loch Modan")
DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFFFCE2ETramBot|r Going to Tram. Ironforge to Stormwind. Be Patient!")
DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFFFCE2ETramBot|r Were on the Tram! CHOO CHOO Heading to Stormwind!")

// waiting Ironforge Position
while (ObjectManager.Me.Position.DistanceTo2D( new Vector3(13.81097f, 2490.611f, -4.227672f, "None")) >40) {Thread.Sleep(100);};
DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFFFCE2ETramBot|r We're at Stormwind Station - Don't forget to Tip!! - Run to Exit")
DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFFFCE2EWeaponMaster|r Training at Weapons Master in Stormwind.")

ObjectManager.Me.WowClass == WoWClass.Warlock && ObjectManager.Me.Level >= 10 && ObjectManager.Me.Level <= 14 && (wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Stormwind City" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Elwynn Forest")
MyFrame.text:SetText("Run Down to Circle of Binding")
